summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4205 for the improvement of Roanoke Street from East Montlake Place to 26th Avenue North produced; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49973, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
